scripts.dev:app: cd apps/file-brain && poetry run python main.py --mode dev
scripts.start:app: cd apps/file-brain && poetry run python main.py --mode prod
scripts.clean:containers: cd apps/file-brain && docker compose rm -sf && echo '✅ Containers removed (project only)'
scripts.clean:volumes: cd apps/file-brain && docker compose down -v && echo '✅ Volumes removed (project only)'
scripts.clean:images: cd apps/file-brain && docker compose down --rmi local && echo '✅ Images removed (project only)'
scripts.clean:images-full: cd apps/file-brain && docker compose down --rmi local && docker image prune -af && echo '✅ Images and dependencies removed (shows realistic pull progress)'
scripts.clean:docker: cd apps/file-brain && docker compose down -v --rmi local && echo '✅ Docker cleaned: containers, volumes, and images removed (project only)'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:docker && npm run clean:db && npm run clean:typesense && echo '✅ Full cleanup complete - ready for fresh wizard test'
scripts.clean:all-full: npm run clean:images-full && npm run clean:volumes && npm run clean:db && npm run clean:typesense && echo '✅ Complete cleanup with dependencies - realistic wizard test'
